      • setAttribute

        public static void setAttribute(long instrument,
                                long attribute,
                                long value)
                         throws VISAException
        Sets a VISA attribute for an instrument
        Parameters:
        instrument - Instrument handle from openInstrument()
        attribute - The attribute to set (defined in VISANativeInterface)
        value - The value to give it
        Throws:
        VISAException - Upon error with VISA interface

      • getAttribute

        public static long getAttribute(long instrument,
                                long attribute)
                         throws VISAException
        Returns the value of the given VISA Attribute for the given instrument
        Parameters:
        instrument - Instrument handle from openInstrument()
        attribute - The attribute to read
        Returns:
        Value assigned to the attribute
        Throws:
        VISAException - Upon error with VISA interface
